title: Magmadon

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Perform the factional kill by heating your fists, then pounding your target with a burning fist.
- Magmadon's ultimate ability, Stomp the ground and summon a line of volcanic craters in front of you, dealing a rampage attack to your target, if it fails to kill 2 or more players, you may use this ability again on the next night for free. (1 use, shared by killing mutants)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Magmadon torches (flavored cleaning) everyone it kills, only Magmadon will learn their role and will.

desc:
Post 3533
*A bipedal turtle-like mutant whose skin and spiky shell are made of magma.Â It has small eyes, a sharp beak and scales on its belly.*
